title: Patial-frequency aware zero-centric residual unfolding network for MRI reconstruction
details: Y Lian, Z Liu, J Wang, S Lu - Magnetic Resonance Imaging, 2025
abstract: Abstract Magnetic Resonance Imaging is a cornerstone of medical diagnostics, providing high-quality soft tissue contrast through non-invasive methods. However, MRI technology faces critical limitations in imaging speed and resolution. Prolonged …
